creditline: Gift of Thomas Murray in honor of Scott Hollander
description: abstract image in black, grey wash, lavender, white, and black; drips and lines; black drips forming circle at top with solid lavender circle inside it; rectangular bars and forms around edges and at bottom half; black drip circle in LRQ; several yellow spots; received in light toned wood frame
signed: at bottom edge in grey (or scratched into pigments?): 1991 Ryōji Koie
title: Unknown [Abstract image]
